name: Mage Glace
body:
### Classical platformer
Mage Glace is a classic platformer telling the story of an unfortunate magician trying to pass his final exam.

### 5 weeks for a game
This game was made as in 5 weeks by a team of two. We consider it more as a draft we used to try our hands at GameMaker and get some experience. Part of the challenge was to craft all the assets: graphics, sounds and code (apart from GameMaker engine).

### Download
There is a window binary and an HTML5 version is on its way. If your platform is not available, consider building it from sources.

### Last word
Whenever you enjoy the game or not, we are always glad to hear about what you thought about it.
Add a comment if you are in the mood, or mail us at plab_and_niddle@googlegroups.com

From Paris with love.

Plab & Niddle
